overview: Dr. Roger Birkman, who founded the company in the early 1950s, remains actively involved in the business as its Chairman. Returning from WWII as a B-17 bomber pilot, Roger studied psychology on the GI bill at the University of Houston. Intrigued by people in the workplace and their perceptions, he completed his doctoral dissertation at the University of Texas by writing his “Test of Social Comprehension”. Roger and his young wife Sue moved from Austin to Houston, Texas and eventually started a management consulting practice (Birkman and Associates) based on the social inventory which became known as The Birkman MethodÂ®.
